title: FortiWeb Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
description: FortiWeb 5.0, 5.1 and 5.2.0 are vulnerable to multiple reflective cross-site scripting issues. Several parameters in the web management interface URLs /user/ldap_user/check_dlg and /user/radius_user/check_dlg lack sufficient input filtering.

application.description: FortiWeb: greater equal 5.0.0, less equal 5.2.0, fixed in 5.2.1
